item.title: Completely setup Resque + Resque Schedule and Resque Mailer
item.description: When developing Rails app, there will be a chance that you will need to setup job scheduler using Resque. In this post, I’d like to share my experience setting up Resque schedule, and resque mailer on my recent Rails application My OneSight.
